response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal goals. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true value, providing you with an exceptional chance to secure such a valuable asset without breaking the bank. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to facilitate a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
